goal.core.program.actions

Class UserSpecAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.parser.ParsedObject
      • goal.core.program.actions.Action
        • goal.core.program.actions.UserSpecAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IParsedObject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ParsedObject>

    public class UserSpecAction
extends Action
    A user-specified action of the form 'name(parameters)' with one or more associated action specifications (i.e., precondition, postcondition pairs). Parameters are optional.

    A user-specified action should at least have one associated action specification. In case an action has multiple action specifications the order of the specifications in the program is taken into account: a specification that occurs before another one is used whenever it is applicable.

    Author:
    K.Hindriks
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Represents a precondition,postcondition pair as specified in the action specification section of the GOAL agent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserSpecAction

        public UserSpecAction(java.lang.String name,
              java.util.List<Term> parameters,
              boolean external,
              InputStreamPosition source)
        Creates a UserSpecAction with name, parameter list, and sets flag whether action should be sent to external environment or not.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the action.
        parameters - The action parameters.
        external - Parameter indicating whether action should be sent to external environment or not. true indicates that action should be sent to environment; false indicates that action should not be sent to environment.
        source - The source code location of this action, if available; null otherwise.

      • setExternal

        public void setExternal(boolean external)
        Sets whether this user-specified action should be sent to environment.
        Parameters:
        external - If true, action is sent to environment.

      • addSpecification

        public boolean addSpecification(ActionSpecification specification)
                         throws KRInitFailedException
        Attempts to add an ActionSpecification, i.e., a precondition and postcondition, to the list of action specifications associated with this UserSpecAction. Fails if the action parameters of the specification do NOT unify with parameters of this UserSpecAction .

        Also renames variables in the action specification to avoid clashes with variables used by the action call itself!

        Parameters:
        specification - The action specification that contains the pre- and post-condition to be associated with this action.
        Returns:
        true, indicating successful addition of the specification, if parameters of the specified action unify with parameters of this UserSpecAction; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        KRInitFailedException

      • mgu

        public Substitution mgu(Action action,
               KRlanguage language)
        Computes a unifier for the actual parameters of this action with those of the given action. Also checks whether action names and number of parameters match.
        Parameters:
        action - The action to unify with.
        language - The KR language used for representing the action parameters.
        Returns:
        A unifying substitution, if a unifier exists; null otherwise.

      • getFreeVar

        public java.util.Set<Var> getFreeVar()
        Returns the (free) variables that occur in the parameters of this UserSpecAction.
        Specified by:
        getFreeVar in class Action
        Returns:

      • applySubst

        public UserSpecAction applySubst(Substitution substitution)
        Applies the given Substitution to parameters of this UserSpecAction as well as to all its action specifications. It instantiates all occurrences of (free) variables in the action's parameters, preconditions and postconditions that are bound by the substitution by the corresponding terms.
        Specified by:
        applySubst in class Action
        Parameters:
        substitution - The substitution to be applied to the action.
        Returns:
        A new instantiated action where (free) variables that are bound by the substitution have been instantiated by the corresponding terms in the substitution.

      • getPrecondition

        public MentalStateCond getPrecondition(KRlanguage language)
        Returns a condition of the form "bel(precondition)" where precondition is the precondition from the first action specification. Does not support multiple action specifications.
        Specified by:
        getPrecondition in class Action
        Parameters:
        language - The KR language used for representing the precondition.
        Returns:
        Precondition of this action of the form "bel(precondition)".

      • getPreconditions

        public java.util.List<Query> getPreconditions()
        Returns all preconditions associated with this action.
        Returns:
        The preconditions as a list of Querys.

      • getPostconditions

        public java.util.List<Update> getPostconditions()
        Returns all postconditions associated with this action.
        Returns:

      • evaluatePrecondition

        public Action evaluatePrecondition(MentalState mentalState,
                          Debugger debugger,
                          boolean last)
        Evaluates the precondition(s) for this UserSpecAction. Returns an instantiated action with the first action specification for which the precondition holds. A substitution for instantiating the action is randomly selected from the set of substitutions that satisfy the precondition of that specification.
        Specified by:
        evaluatePrecondition in class Action
        Parameters:
        mentalState - The MentalState in which the precondition is evaluated.
        debugger - The current debugger
        last - If this is the last possible variation we are trying to execute, e.g. after this there are no more possibilities and the action will fail.
        Returns:
        An instantiated action with the first action specification for which the precondition holds; null otherwise.

      • getOptions

        protected java.util.Set<Substitution> getOptions(MentalState mentalState,
                                     Debugger debugger)
        Searches for the first action specification of this action whose precondition holds in the given mental state.
        Parameters:
        mentalState - The mental state used for evaluating the precondition.
        debugger - The current debugger
        Returns:
        The solutions, i.e., set of substitutions that satisfy the precondition that was found, or the empty set otherwise.

      • getSelectedActionSpec

        protected UserSpecAction getSelectedActionSpec()
        Returns this user-specified action where all action specifications other than the one found by #getOptions(MentalState, SteppingDebugger) have been removed.

        Only call this AFTER a call to #getOptions(MentalState, SteppingDebugger) .

        Returns:
        This user-specified action where all action specifications other than the one found by #getOptions(MentalState, SteppingDebugger) have been removed.
